text: a. the temporary use of vacant or derelict land; and b. the use of incidental open space on housing estates and other open space areas. BACK TO POLICIES Supporting text 18.108 Food growing can have a positive impact on physical and mental health and well-being, creating opportunities for social interaction and cross-cultural engagement, as well as providing a source of fresh and low-cost food for local communities. In recognition of these positive impacts, part 1 seeks to ensure that all lawful existing allotments and community gardens are retained and enhanced where possible.
